entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
